title: WTB: Pre-Integration Negro/Cuban League Postcards w/HOF'ers
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: WTB: Pre-Integration Negro/Cuban League Postcards w/HOF'ers
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy any pre-integration Negro/Cuban League Baseball postcards picturing teams that include two or more Hall of Famers. If you have one of these for sale, please send me a PM or e-mail to: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
